A speech spoken in the House of Commons, by the Reverend Father in God, Robert, L. Bishop of Coventry and Lichfield. Being brought to the barre to answer for himselfe. Wright, Robert, 1560-1643.
[2], 4 p.
Printed by R. B. for Richard Lownds, and are to be sold at his Shop without Ludgate, London : 1641. [i.e. 1642]
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
